title: Short-Term Mobile-Based Scientific Literacy Development Program (Large-Scale)

context.additional_context: Job-integrated training conducted in smartphone-based constrained environments.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain five core concepts of the Nature of Science (NOS) through the Mobile-NOS model with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can demonstrate critical thinking skills by simulating scientific inquiry processes in mobile environments.
Learners can propose scientific literacy application possibilities with over 70% accuracy by analyzing real workplace cases.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
